4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

brush-tile

Generic function

Summary

Returns the tile pattern of a brush.

Signature

brush-tile brush => image

Arguments

brush
An instance of type <brush>.

Values

image
An instance of type <image>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Returns the tile pattern of brush.

See also

brush-stipple, page 130.

brush-ts-x, page 131 and brush-ts-y, page 132.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
